name: The game without(with) idea
description:
The game without idea, but the main idea is in the absence of idea, heh )

This is pixel top-down shooter with roguelike and RPG elements.

Game has been launched, we have: 

-3 locations(stages)

-Starter room(bar)

-10 kinds of armor, 14 weapons and 12 enemies

Thank you for playing!
